analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0xf7be133620a7d944595683ce2b14156591efe609.sol:
	Contract againstCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0xf7be133620a7d944595683ce2b14156591efe609.sol#227)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xf7be133620a7d944595683ce2b14156591efe609.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
